programme.title: Celebrity Lingo S1
programme.desc: Celebrity Lingo is a spin-off from the fast-paced daytime word game Lingo. Celebrity Lingo is hosted by RuPaul Charles, Famous twosomes will work against the clock as they try to figure out where the letters go in a series of words... but it's not as easy as it might sound. The celebs will also be hoping to guess enough words correctly in order to win money for their chosen charity.

programme.title: Dirty Home Rescue
programme.desc: Cleaning expert Hayley Leitch and her team of professional cleaners answer SOS calls from Britain's filthiest houses while identifying unhealthy habits which cause mess.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S1
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Modern Marvels: Toys
programme.desc: Adam's not playing around, he's working hard to find out how some toys transform from mere playthings into valuable collectibles, nostalgic beacons of our childhood and thus classics. Adam visits Stern to see how their pinball machines have outlasted the competition and even the law! Plus, how have Slinkys kept springing back? How was the Rubik's Cube invented? How does Lionel trains keep chugging and how does Hasbro get that amazing smell into its can of Play-Doh?

programme.title: Planet Action S4
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets, and get insight information on how the filmmakers make giant monsters come to life. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

programme.title: Survivor 47
programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Supa Strikas
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Malay) Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Henrietta
programme.desc: Henrietta, the cow, lives on a little farm together with the farmer and lots of other animals. Her life is full of big and small adventures, chaos, exciting journeys and sometimes even parties!

programme.title: Henrietta
programme.desc: Henrietta, the cow, lives on a little farm together with the farmer and lots of other animals. Her life is full of big and small adventures, chaos, exciting journeys and sometimes even parties!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S2
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: Blippi 2
programme.desc: Blippi's enthusiastic and expressive character engages children on their level through relatable adventures while sharing their excitement in discovering the world around us. Blippi is so entertaining, engaging and fun, kids don't even realize they're learning!

programme.title: Blippi 2
programme.desc: Blippi's enthusiastic and expressive character engages children on their level through relatable adventures while sharing their excitement in discovering the world around us. Blippi is so entertaining, engaging and fun, kids don't even realize they're learning!

programme.title: Ollie & Friends (Season 3)
programme.desc: Put on your helmets and get ready to blast off into outer space. This episode, Ollie and his friends explore the role of Astronauts. Join them as they sing, dance and see the world from the earth and beyond.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Sesame Street S53
programme.desc: In this season, Ji-Young, a Korean-American girl muppet joins the main cast!

programme.title: Yakka Dee: Sr3
programme.desc: Return of the entertaining and inspiring series, with appealing animated character Dee revealing a whole new set of words. In each episode Dee sets off on a whirlwind word adventure. As she shows various visualisations of how the word's used, there are special surprises along the way - and everyone has a boogie when Dee's friend succeeds in saying the episode's featured word!

As she shows various visualisations of how the word's used, there are special surprises along the way - and everyone has a boogie when Dee's friend succeeds in saying the episode's featured word!

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy spy a figure on the moon. Worried that it's stranded and determined to help, they fly up to the moon, only to find a giant alien beast. Their attempts to help enrage it instead, and now the gang has an angry beast on their tail! They say if you send a lantern up into the sky, your wish will be granted. Sloppy has a lot of wishes, so he makes a giant lantern. Unfortunately, his lantern carries more than just his wishes up into the sky --- their entire house with it too!

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Young Geo explores Tangra-planet, an amazing place with geometrical landscapes, along with his friends the Tangranimals . These amusing creatures can link together like Tangram pieces, and thus create all sorts of vehicles, creatures and objects. With that power, plus a good measure of imagination, Geo and his friends are ready to meet any challenge!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S2
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: Dino Ranch S2
programme.desc: Dino Ranch follows the action packed adventures of the Cassidy family as they tackle life in a fantastical, 'pre-westoric' setting where dinosaurs still roam.

programme.title: Dino Ranch S2
programme.desc: Dino Ranch follows the action packed adventures of the Cassidy family as they tackle life in a fantastical, 'pre-westoric' setting where dinosaurs still roam.

programme.title: Miniforce X [S2]
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) The Miniforce fight against Villains threatening the Earth! Our heroes Volt, Max, Sammy and Lucy come back with upgraded X-power!

programme.title: Open Season: Call of Nature
programme.desc: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes animals of every kind. Under the leadership of Boog and Elliot, the Campers must all work together to help create their own slice of paradise in the middle of the wilderness and to rediscover their inner wild.

programme.title: Open Season: Call of Nature
programme.desc: When Boog and Elliot discover an abandoned Summer Camp in the middle of nowhere, they embark on a brave new adventure of creating a safe and special place to live that welcomes animals of every kind. programme.title: PJ Masks S4
programme.desc: Instead of going to bed like all the other children, when our heroes get their pyjamas on, they magically transform into super heroes and become the PJ Masks!

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series (S24)
programme.desc: Join the continuing research fellowship adventures of Alola Champion Ash Ketchum and Goh, as they travel across all eight regions, including the new Galar region and Crown Tundra, based at Cerise Laboratory in Vermillion City in the Kanto region.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: On The Red Dot offers weekly in-depth analysis and discussion on key issues and events that matter to Singaporeans.

programme.title: Le Bisellahause (HD)
programme.desc: While at a viewing, Mikey sees Slick Rick, a rival agent, selling a property just a couple of doors down. Through a bit of spying, Mikey discovers that it's actually a front for vice activities! Mikey has two options - he can keep things quiet so as not to scare off his own client or he can do the right thing and call the police. But sneaky Mikey goes with option 3 blackmail! Will he succeed in his diabolical scheme?

programme.desc: (Live).

programme.desc: (Live) The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Elsbeth S1
programme.desc: Astute but unconventional attorney Elsbeth Tascioni utilizes her singular point of view to make unique observations and corner brilliant criminals alongside the NYPD.

programme.title: Sullivan's Crossing - Series 3
programme.desc: Edna learns the reason behind her vision loss, and Maggie discovers there's more to the diagnosis than they first thought.Cal believes that Maggie's missing her career, while relationships come to a head at the opening of Rob's restaurant.

programme.title: Kumar Vs The World
programme.desc: Swipe right or swipe wrong? Kumar dives headfirst into the chaotic world of modern love — dating apps, ghosting, situationships, red flags and a whole lot more. Are dating apps killing romance? All this and much more on Kumar VSModern Dating!

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S4
programme.desc: The Fugitive Task Force relentlessly tracks notorious criminals on the Bureau's Most Wanted list.

programme.title: Patagonia - Series 1
programme.desc: Over six stunning episodes, expert local crews join an international team of the world's best wildlife filmmakers to explore uncharted territory, discover new species and tell an urgent environmental story. Patagonia travels the 2000-mile length and Atlantic-to-Pacific breadth of this vast, enigmatic region to illuminate five distinct terrains: majestic mountains, the far south, dense forests, hostile deserts and breath-taking fjordlands.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S1
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure
programme.desc: Experience the Emerald Isle as you've never seen it before, as we join Donal and his faithful dog Max on a culinary road trip around Ireland, discovering the people, places and ingredients that make it magical. In each episode, Donal will be cooking up a local dish, from fresh lobster rolls on the dramatic coastline of West Cork to oyster shooters in Galway's picturesque oasis.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Everything you've ever wanted to know about Europe - from traditions and habits to culture shocks and record breakers.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: 最火搭档2
programme.desc: 婕妤以宏博心理医生的身份前来探视宏博，不料却被宏博挟持。他要求与乐琳见面，竟想和乐琳同归于尽！.

programme.title: 最火搭档2
programme.desc: 乐琳将正仪带到一废置空屋. 小曼赶到空屋，目睹大小眼即将被吊死，却见死不救。.

programme.title: 微笑正义
programme.desc: (PG)故事围绕着一群对揭发事实真相极具热忱的新闻工作者，从中带出新闻背后不为人知的秘密。演员：戴向宇饰方正业;瑞恩饰刘言之;林慧玲饰冯洛凌;陈泂江饰唐智胜.

programme.desc: 查某人.

programme.title: 查某人
programme.desc: 查某人.

programme.title: 有何贵食
programme.desc: 民以食为天，人人都爱吃，不管是什么人。吃得好，吃得精已不稀奇，很多人更趋向于吃得奢华，吃得贵，吃得稀有。世界上有些食物或食材以价格昂贵出名。究竟它们有多贵？为何会卖得如此高价？是因为物以稀为贵？还是物以贵为稀？是为了搞噱头？还是背后有什么不为人知的苦衷？那它们的味道有什么特别？它们的烹调法又有何与众不同？想要品尝，得去哪里找？.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 前线追踪
programme.desc: 民情、民生、民意！【前线追踪】紧跟社会民生步伐，追踪调查时事动态，探讨新加坡人关心的课题，针对问题的核心追根究底。.

programme.title: 力挽狂篮
programme.desc: 云林结合训练和娱乐的方式让队友在玩乐中同时改善弱点。云林的情绪变化跟平时不一样。失恋消沉的安琪，落选校际比赛的首发球员名单。William 和 MIT 两队展开对决。云林带队紧追比分，由于实力悬殊，云林还是落败。谁知她不屈不挠的魄力，竟让她被球探发掘，得到职业球队试训的机会。路途中，她突然晕倒。.

programme.title: 狮城热话
programme.desc: 周一至周五晚上7点，《狮城有约》谈话性栏目《狮城热话》以汇集多元声音及专家看法为目标，通过网络投票和引导观点碰撞，打造能让观众参与的时事舆论场。.

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 邓丽君在收容所万分想念仲文。她被裁定无罪但一年内不准进入日本，她决定去美国继续开演唱会。段宁想方设法对台生好，台生被打动了，向段宁求婚，段宁喜极而泣。.

programme.title: 焦点
programme.desc: 《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响。.

programme.title: 甘味人生
programme.desc: 甘味人生，是一出阐述「一家人世代传承家业」的励志写实戏剧。剧中赵家是制作传统手工酱油的一个大家庭，家庭的父母兄弟姊妹，共同为这个家努力打拼的历程为主轴，描写刻画每个人在打拼的过程当中，与纠结在矛盾的感情世界里，所经历的悲欢喜乐。.

programme.title: 甘味人生
programme.desc: 甘味人生，是一出阐述「一家人世代传承家业」的励志写实戏剧。剧中赵家是制作传统手工酱油的一个大家庭，家庭的父母兄弟姊妹，共同为这个家努力打拼的历程为主轴，描写刻画每个人在打拼的过程当中，与纠结在矛盾的感情世界里，所经历的悲欢喜乐。.

programme.title: 一点新闻
programme.desc: (现场直播) 《一点新闻》为您提供更新的本地与全球新闻头条。.

programme.title: 开心速递
programme.desc: 故事围绕着洪氏和龙氏家族、他们的工作生活和朋友展开，在之前的剧集中，龙景峰的幽灵与洪氏家族成员结下了深厚的友谊。.

programme.title: 开心速递
programme.desc: 故事围绕着洪氏和龙氏家族、他们的工作生活和朋友展开，在之前的剧集中，龙景峰的幽灵与洪氏家族成员结下了深厚的友谊。.

programme.title: 开心速递

programme.title: 你好，我的大夫
programme.desc: 中医博士生辜清劲到政府中医诊所由低做起，跟年轻医师们并肩医治病患，诊所主任竟是跟他理念不合的前女友程嘉应；他理想，她现实，两人共同成长，连手改变现状。.

programme.title: 你好，我的大夫
programme.desc: 中医博士生辜清劲到政府中医诊所由低做起，跟年轻医师们并肩医治病患，诊所主任竟是跟他理念不合的前女友程嘉应；他理想，她现实，两人共同成长，连手改变现状。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 狮城有约
programme.desc: (现场直播) 总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 汪仲文去找邓丽君，邓丽君并叮嘱他要多陪在母亲身边。宜芳催促仲文趁自己还活着尽快结婚。邓丽君在美国一炮而红，并接受了拉斯维加斯市长的荣誉市民颁奖。此时，段宁顺利生了一个儿子。.

programme.title: 香港系列之原味道
programme.desc: 香港人北上吃喝的热潮持续，久而久之或忽略了同样具有特色的本土味道。近年不少本地老字号、食肆、食品厂因不同原因结业，市民实应珍惜现时仍留下来、一直坚持「香港制造」的有心人。五位主持黄剑文、冼靖峰、潘静文、庄子璇、王汛文引领观众走进农田、鱼排，见识香港农业、渔业的发展。节目也会从土炮食材出发，寻找真正来自本港或香港制造的优质食材，借以支持一班坚守原味道的业界朋友，协助振兴本土经济。.

programme.title: 力挽狂篮
programme.desc: 云林患上一型糖尿病，世界崩塌。众人陪在云林身边给予支持。大田和美人痛心，并自责没好好照顾云林。贝贝和云风皆因云林的病，感到人生不应该等待。一段时间后安琪和韩槟再次不期而遇，韩槟坦言意识到失去安琪后的落差，决定给彼此一个机会，搞清自己的感情。云林在面对病痛和家庭的支持中，最终决定接受现实。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: (现场直播) 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 中东密探
programme.desc: 在经过爆胎意外以后，前往全沙乌地阿拉伯唯四开放给非穆斯林参观的清真寺，也顺道品尝最正宗的中东烤肉大餐，并且在最后的水上清真寺旁发现为了开斋节而建造的小游乐园。.

programme.title: 长相思第二季
programme.desc: 玱玹挺过五叔和七叔的打压与暗算，成功接下西炎国的王位。小夭为了帮助玱玹的大业，打算倚仗中原氏族的团结助玱玹一臂之力，与赤水丰隆达成联姻的约定，而涂山璟以三十七年粮草收买防风邶在大婚典礼上当众抢婚，但防风邶也付出代价必须以死谢罪，从此相柳失去防风邶这个身份。尽管如此，青丘族长涂山璟与九头蛇妖相柳仍默默守护着小夭。.

programme.title: 斗罗大陆之燃魂战
programme.desc: 全大陆高级魂师学院精英赛决赛后，唐三与小伙伴们依依惜别，他们约定五年后再聚首，随即分头踏上各自的人生道路。武魂殿比比东暗中布局，横扫几大宗门，妄图称霸斗罗大陆。于是唐三集结伙伴们创立唐门，秉持对正义的追求，坚定扛起重任。他们合力勇闯海神岛，对抗武魂殿，不畏黑暗势力和强权，携手维护全大陆和平，匡扶正义，共同成长为不屈不挠的战士。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 V
programme.desc: 《詹姆士出走料理》以寻找詹姆士私厨菜单为节目主轴，为了寻找记忆中的美味料理，詹姆士将带领大家探索市场，品尝在地美味、寻访料理达人。并在节目中展现特殊食材的处理方式、尝试新的酱料或是新的料理作法，制作创意料理(料理教学)，最后在节目片尾时作出一道『詹姆士创意料理.

programme.title: 多情城市
programme.desc: 本剧以1960年代至1970年代的九份地区为背景，述说三个拜把兄弟如何赤手空拳打天下，藉由上一代的爱情故事串连与第二代之间共同的情感与记忆，深度探索两代之间的价值观差异。.

programme.title: 亚洲新声
programme.desc: 该节目由新声启航人Jessie J、新声召集人张靓颖、新声见证人张信哲、新声护航员尤长靖四位歌手加盟，携手亚洲新声代歌手共同开启跨越文化界限的音乐盛宴.

programme.title: 收场
programme.desc: 收场.

programme.title: 收场
programme.desc: 收场.

programme.title: 熊猫一家人
programme.desc: Ep 1: 实习生饲养员互选分组大公开 “妈宝熊”贤贤崽花式粘人技能放送。.

programme.title: 畏口大开
programme.desc: 羊角豆让一对夫妇嘉宾洪俊扬和杜蕙甹看到就竖起汗毛！两人接受挑战，与“敌人”正面交锋 - 到农场种羊角豆，到娘惹餐馆吃惊人的羊角豆料理。李心钰也找来一对好友名厨，结合潮州和美式料理的烹饪手法，重新演绎羊角豆！.

programme.title: 第二任丈夫
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 此剧讲述因无法停止的欲望酿成的悲剧，令一个女人无辜地失去家人，她在错综复杂的命运和爱情中展开复仇的故事。.

programme.title: 皇家医生
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/泰) 主要讲述了菜鸟学渣女医生，在电闪雷鸣的某一天意外穿越进古代王朝，并开启了自己在古代的医学生涯的故事，在此过程中，她结识了身为皇家医生的男主一家，在共同经历风雨后互生情愫却又不得不面临分开结局的故事.

programme.title: 天伦之情
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 新的视频证据曝光，将道贤与尚哲的死联系在一起。 同时，尹松接到治焕的电话后，立刻赶去寻找他。.

programme.title: 天伦之情
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 随着对他不利的证据不断增加，道贤选择了极端的方式。 尹松获得重审并被判无罪，而治焕终于被绳之以法，判处终身监禁。.

programme.title: 全民星攻略
programme.desc: 本集聚焦于现代社会中日益普遍的「文明病」，并邀请健康专家解析这些疾病的成因、最新的治疗方案以及预防方法——失眠视现代常见的文明病之一，若使用安眠药助眠建议要「天天定时服用」还是「间断性使用」？ 蹲马桶也有学问，为减缓「痔疮」的可能，建议排便时间要控制在「10分钟」还是「5分钟」以内？ 分析显示，「泡温泉」与「烤箱汗蒸室」何者可以改善慢性下背痛的症状？.

programme.title: 金秘书为何那样
programme.desc: (双声道 - 中/韩) 微笑接到朴社长电话，立刻 到游乐场赴约，游乐场的灯全都亮了，烟花四起，英俊款款走来。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻
programme.desc: 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: Ultraman Arc
programme.desc: The story is about Arc protecting the future of the Earth and mankind from looming threats. Yuma transforms into Ultraman Arc by inserting the Arc Cube, which contains the power of the being of light, into the mystic Arc Ariser and unleashing his power.

programme.title: Geo Park Indonesia
programme.desc: Geopark Indonesia discusses about every Geopark located in Indonesia. It provides full information Including the beautiful scenery from each places, traditional ceremonies, and the local culinary as well. By inviting all audience to love and appreciate natural wealth, the program has nominated as the best travel program by Komisi Penyiaran Indonesia.

programme.title: Azam & Johan
programme.desc: Azam & Johan aspire to be professional footballers. An accident renders Azam paralyzed, dashing his football dream. Their mother blames Johan for the accident. Azam feels his world has ended. Wrecked with guilt, Johan wants to give up football but his father stops him. Will the family be torn apart forever by the tragedy or overcome to find happiness again?

programme.title: Kerasnya Takdir
programme.desc: Munir confesses his love to Jiha. He announces to his family that he will not be taking the next steps with Emelia.

programme.title: S.P.Y.
programme.desc: Yusuf is suspicious of Azrul from beginning. He informs Chris and Juliana that he thinks there might be more than meets the eye with Azrul. Azrul is shocked to hear that everything was staged. The team having a memorial for their slain friend Jamal, but it seems that Maria might have some unfinished business.

programme.title: Aku Seorang Perempuan
programme.desc: Siti Noraisya patches up with Fareez. Adriana hatches up a plan to derail Fareez's plans to marry Siti Noraisya. Fareez starts to get insecure as Siti Noraisya takes on more projects with Hakim, her childhood friend and singing partner.

programme.title: Cahaya Cinta Azzura
programme.desc: Cahaya, a beautiful young woman, works tirelessly at a fishery owned by Adipura, a wealthy and influential manin a quiet Sukabumi village. Her life takes an unexpected turn when her fatehr suffers a tragic accident and is hospitalised. Sttruggling to find a way to cover the mounting medical bills, Cahaya turns tio Adipura for help. He agrees to provide the money she desperately needs - but only on one condition: she must marry him.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live S8 ( 2023 )
programme.desc: Jep, Rahim, Pak Ya and Ebby Yus are back to entertain you in the latest season featuring special celebrity guests and unexpected cameos every week. Guest Artist - Zarina Anjoulie Cameo Appearance - Zamani.

programme.title: Gadis Masa
programme.desc: Maya travels back to 2014 as Maryam once more, determined to reunite her younger self with Khairi, but some things are simply beyond her control.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti
programme.desc: Yem invites Arianna and her brother to stay at his place after they get chased out of Riz's house. Ara helps Khairil patch his relationship with Reza through a business decision.

programme.title: Ultraman Arc
programme.desc: The story is about Arc protecting the future of the Earth and mankind from looming threats. Yuma transforms into Ultraman Arc by inserting the Arc Cube, which contains the power of the being of light, into the mystic Arc Ariser and unleashing his power.

programme.title: Janji Sedap
programme.desc: Join our chef as he takes you to a culinary journey and learn how to whip up vibrant and flavoursome cuisine.

programme.title: Jangan Lupa Janji
programme.desc: Rayan's mysterious death from suspected food poisoning devastates Raihana. Meanwhile, Mikail grows darker, plotting against anyone who stands in his way.

programme.title: Berita

programme.title: Manja S10
programme.desc: (Live) Manja Season 10 is back with a new vibe—bolder, brighter, and packed with everything you love! Join Zhin, Natasha, Shenty, and Iskandar for flavorful food trips, real talk, and fun adventures throughout Singapore. Also, a new segment, BOLEH IKUT, with interesting profiles, peeking behind the scenes of unique jobs.

programme.title: Boneka
programme.desc: Fiza is shaken as memories of her engagement to Irfan resurface. Nona tightens her hold on Iryan through subtle manipulation, while Bella feels threatened by Naura and Nona's unexpected bond. Beneath it all, pieces of Bella's hidden past begin to unravel.

programme.title: Derhaka Sebuah Cinta
programme.desc: Azmeer is determined to take action to ensure Kyra's shares are transferred to him. Meanwhile, Dahlia pursues an alternative method to investigate the disappearance of her child.

programme.desc: Uravai Thedi which means 'searching for the kin' is a show that bridges the gap between individuals and families that were separated due to various reasons.

programme.title: Siri…Siri Siri Siri S3
programme.desc: Compilation of comedy clips to tickle your laughing bone.

programme.title: Indian Beat S16
programme.desc: A bilingual magazine show that serves as a platform by featuring activities and events organized by the various Tamil and Indian ethnic organizations around Singapore.

programme.title: Siri…Siri Siri Siri S3
programme.desc: Compilation of comedy clips to tickle your laughing bone.

programme.title: Rasikka Rusikka S5
programme.desc: Host, Bala returns with an exciting Season 5 of Rasikka Rusikka. This time, the journey takes us through the Klang Valley in search of the ultimate brunch spots.

programme.title: Rasikka Rusikka S5
programme.desc: Host, Bala returns with an exciting Season 5 of Rasikka Rusikka. This time, the journey takes us through the Klang Valley in search of the ultimate brunch spots.

programme.title: Ratha Kanneer
programme.desc: Mohanasundaram, a philanderer and drunkard, gets married to Chandra after he returns to India. Though he has a wife, he develops a relationship with Kantha, a prostitute.

programme.title: Savaal Singapore 3
programme.desc: This game show concept is an adaptation from the English version of We are Singaporeans . All questions and everything about the show will be about Singapore .There will be 6 celebrities in each episode and they will banter with the host and contestants and also ask the questions!

programme.title: Nadigan (1990)
programme.desc: A man in desperate need of money decides to disguise himself as an old man to teach two young women. He falls in love with one of the them and simultaneously romances their guardian.

programme.title: Mitcham Meethi Puthusu
programme.desc: Mitcham Meedi Puthusu strives to educate our audience to reduce food wastage by creating some mouthwatering new dish for the family in a healthy way. we also plan to set new trend across local channels in an attempt to be creative in saving food. leftover food need not be tasteless or boring, it can be a new avenue for creativity.

programme.title: Mitcham Meethi Puthusu
programme.desc: Mitcham Meedi Puthusu strives to educate our audience to reduce food wastage by creating some mouthwatering new dish for the family in a healthy way. we also plan to set new trend across local channels in an attempt to be creative in saving food. leftover food need not be tasteless or boring, it can be a new avenue for creativity.

programme.title: Vaan Varu Vaan
programme.desc: VARU, a struggling writer who's trolled for her mediocre stories, is trying to write the greatest love story ever. But each time she tries to write, severe headaches, sleepiness and anything that will make her procrastinate will take over. Meanwhile VIKRAM enters her life. He has loved her from afar as a family friend for many years and now has entered into an arranged marriage alliance with her.

programme.title: Seithi
programme.desc: (Live) Tamil Seithi focuses primarily on local and international news, information and current affairs. Catch the online news portal at http://seithi.mediacorp.sg/.

programme.title: Goli Soda: Rising
programme.desc: Ravi assigns Thillai a new business venture, which unexpectedly lets him meet his former flame. Meanwhile, Mayil is released from jail and pays a visit to the boys.

programme.title: Medai
programme.desc: A theatre play is an expression of many experiences and stories. And every culture in the world has its own methods and techniques of telling a story on stage. What if a theatre director could get to soak in a plethora of such experiences? How will they shape their theatrical creation? Two young Singaporean theatre directors set out to explore & understand the nuances of the theatre forms of India, and note down the ideas that take shape in their mind at every turn.

programme.title: Aah!
programme.desc: Naren runs a charming little bistro with a spooky reputation. He jokes that it's the haunted atmosphere that attracts customers, but the real secret is his cook, Mother Devi. Her delicious dishes are what truly bring people in. However, Naren has a special talent---he can tell which of his diners are living and which are lingering spirits. Newly hired Priya, the ever-loyal waitress, gets spooked from time to time, but she stays because of her growing affection for Naren.

programme.title: Yaar 2
programme.desc: Krish's weak story combined with an incriminating piece of evidence results in him being detained temporarily. As Shalini and Mythili toy with the idea of going to the police, Rishi reveals that Jeeva might beat them all to it first.

programme.title: Mellisai Hits S3
programme.desc: Collection of hit melody songs from 1990s - 2000s.

programme.desc: We use our bath towel daily but how often are we washing it? Steven Chia sends our viewers' bath towels to a lab to find out what could be growing in them, if they're not washed often enough.

programme.title: Lunch With Masters Of Finance
programme.desc: Having fundraised a billion dollars, veteran advisor, financier and investor, Michael Sng, is leveraging his private equity know-how to build profitable businesses for rural communities and investors.

programme.title: Hobsessions
programme.desc: Hobsession takes you on a captivating journey into the lives of extraordinary individuals who have turned their hobbies into lifelong obsessions. The series dives deep into a unique craft or activity, showcasing people who are not just enthusiasts but true masters of their art.

programme.title: Singapore Hidden in 40 Objects
programme.desc: A torn dollar note used in a secret deal. School shoes with a World War II link. Cows that enjoyed air-conditioned pampering. Join Sam Driscoll as he uncovers stories that were never taught in school.

programme.desc: Taiwan's late president Chiang Kai-shek fought for One China. 50 years after his death, his contested legacy divides the territory. On the mainland, he's revered as a symbol of national unity.

programme.title: The Gen-Z Rebels
programme.desc: Three governments - Nepal, Sri Lanka, and Bangladesh - collapsed in the last year. Indonesia, the Philippines, and India are facing renewed protests, marking one of the most turbulent political crises in recent history. We meet the Gen-Z rebels behind these movements to investigate their sense of “grievance”.
